meanings.sent1: The unfermented grapes tasted very sweet.
meanings.sent2: The unfermented dough was still sticky.
meanings.sent3: The unfermented milk refused to turn into yogurt.
meanings.sent4: Her unfermented ideas needed time to develop.
meanings.sent5: The unfermented tea leaves retained their natural flavors.

meanings.sent1: The unfermented pickles were crunchy and fresh.
meanings.sent2: The unfermented beer lacked its characteristic fizz.
meanings.sent3: The unfermented cheese had a bland taste.
meanings.sent4: His unfermented plans needed some excitement.
meanings.sent5: The unfermented soil smelled earthy and raw.
